name: infusion
description: Infusion is an application framework for developing flexible stuff with JavaScript
author: Fluid Project

scripts.test: npm run test:browser && npm run test:node
scripts.test:node: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover tests/node-tests/basic-node-tests.js --report none --print none
scripts.test:vagrant: vagrant up && vagrant ssh -c 'cd /home/vagrant/sync/; DISPLAY=:0 npm test'
scripts.test:vagrantBrowser: vagrant up && vagrant ssh -c 'cd /home/vagrant/sync/; DISPLAY=:0 npm run test:browser'
scripts.test:vagrantNode: vagrant up && vagrant ssh -c 'cd /home/vagrant/sync/; DISPLAY=:0 npm run test:node'
scripts.posttest: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js report --root coverage --dir reports text-summary html
